item.description:
Summer is over. It's time to get back to some serious networking.

Agenda
6:00PM - Welcome and Introductions
6:30PM - Roundtable discussion
7:00PM - Guest Speaker - Bob Allard
7:15PM - Speed Networking
7:45PM - Building Boston Ecademy
8:00PM - Meeting Adjourns

$5.00 for Members who RSVP by September 28th. $8.00 for anyone else.

If you come after 6:00PM the front door will be locked, please call me at 617-429-6571 and I will come and let you in.

I look forward to another fun and productive meeting.

TO GET THE MOST OUT OF THIS MEETING, DO THE FOLLOWING:
1) Bring at least 50 business cards to pass out
2) Prepare your one-minute introduction - who you are, what you do (plus your background), what you need and how you can help others. The better your one-minute introduction, the more successful you'll be in networking.

Best Regards
- Phil

For more information, see http://www.ecademy.co...
item.name: Boston Ecademy September Meetup
